problem_text:
Given a set P of odd primes, let CTP(Z) denote the subgroup of CT(Z) which is generated by all class transpositions which interchange residue classes whose moduli have only prime factors in P ∪ {2}. The groups CTP(Z) are simple (Math. Z., 264, no. 4 (2010), 927–938). Are they pairwise nonisomorphic?
S. Kohl
